full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title (English)/Titre de l'appel d'offres (français)**
TBIPS - I.9 System Administrator / SPICT - I.9 Administrateur de systèmes

**Reference Number/Nombre de référence**
cb-8210-58451341

**Public Solicitation Number/Numéro de sollicitation**
NRCan-5000074105-A

**Publication Date/Date de publication**
2023-08-16

**Tender Closing Date/Date limite de soumission**
2023-09-08T14:00:00

**Tender Status/Statut de l'appel d'offres**
Expired / Expiré

**Scope of Work/Développement de terrain**
Information technology IT management services / Services de gestion des technologies de l'information

**Procurement Method/Méthode d'approvisionnement**
Competitive - Selective tendering / Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif

**Regional Opportunities/Opportunités régionales**
National Capital Region (NCR) / Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)

**Contact Information/Informations de contact**
* Bianca Moore
	+ bianca.moore@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
	+ (343) 543-4785
	+ 580 booth street, Ottawa, ON K1A0E4, Canada

### Tender Notification

Notice/Mise en garde: This tender is a re-solicitation of NRCan-5000074105. For a detailed description, please refer to the attached documents.

The Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) hereby invites bids for the provision of TBIPS I.9 System Administrator services. These services are to be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR).

The scope of work includes IT management services, and the solicitation method is competitive with selective tendering.

Bidders are encouraged to review the tender documents, including the notice for solicitation and the contract information attached, in French and English.

For any questions or clarifications regarding this tender, please contact Bianca Moore at 343-543-4785 or via email at bianca.moore@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca. 

### Additional Resources

A copy of the tender notice is available for download at the following link:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice
